posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

​ !!! focushexo !!! 1.hexo安装1.1 Windows hexo 安装1.1.1 安装Nodejs & Git NODEJS地址：Nodejs官网nodejs.org 下载 | Node.js 中文网 (nodejs.cn) GIT地址：Git (git-scm.com) :information_source:Nodejs下载版本有LTS、Current，建议使用：LTS:Long Time Support,Current是当前最新版本 npm install -g cnpm –registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org 1.1.2 安装hexo12345# C:\Users\focus>npm install hexo-cli -g# C:\Users\focus>hexo -v网络不行执行# npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.orgcnpm install hexo-cli -g :information_source:npm install -g 全局安装文件在： C:\Users\focus\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\hexo-cli 1.1.3 初始化hexo执行hexo init
